name: perl-bio-ensembl

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: The Ensembl Core Perl API and SQL schema

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-config-inifiles
dependencies.description: A module for reading .ini-style configuration files.

dependencies.name: perl-dbd-mysql
dependencies.description: MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface (DBI)

dependencies.name: perl-dbi
dependencies.description:
The DBI is the standard database interface module for Perl. It defines a
set of methods, variables and conventions that provide a consistent
database interface independent of the actual database being used.

dependencies.name: perl-gzip-faster
dependencies.description: Simple and fast gzip and gunzip

dependencies.name: perl-http-tiny
dependencies.description: HTTP::Tiny: A small, simple, correct HTTP/1.1 client perl module

dependencies.name: perl-io-compress
dependencies.description: A perl library for uncompressing gzip, zip, bzip2 or lzop file/buffer.

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependent_to.name: perl-bio-ensembl-funcgen
dependent_to.description: Ensembl Funcgen Perl API and SQL schema.
